about_the_game:
Your journey takes you from your birthplace of Sorrelfield to the mysterious Za of the desert and through the fast-paced lives of The Uprooted, to name a few.

Discover all 10 factions and choose your place among them. Llamas always look for greener pastures - it's time to find yours!

Battle through the singleplayer campaign or craft items and trade them with your friends after PvPing.

Master the turn-based combat system and find new ways of playing your character, all while doing it in a game that combines the best parts of your favorite old-school RPGs mixed together into its own unique style.

Key Features
  • 2D 16 Bit Style Graphics
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Complex Crafting System & Professions
  • Endless Itemization Options
  • Talent Trees & Specializations
  • Unique Puzzles & Fight Mechanics
  • Buy Once - Enjoy Forever: No Monetization or DLCs
  • Planned Mobile & Console Support

The entire world is meant to have a purpose and often be revisited for various quests, grinds, or simply for fun. No gimmicks, no LlamaPass, no PayToWin mechanics; just pure reward for putting in the work and becoming better at the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Raspberry Pi 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Raspberry Pi 5 with overclocking
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: A JRPG that brings you face to face with challenging combat, class customization, and tough choices. Trade items, create unique characters and fight other players. Bring your llama to greener pastures while never running out of things to explore or enemies to vanquish.
